title: Poster, 1997-19-162, 1972–76
medium: Offset lithograph on white wove paper
signed: Imprinted in black lower left corner: Conseiller-Architecture: Roger Taillibert Directeurs artistiques: Georges Huel et Pierre-Yves Pelletier, Yvon Laroche, Guy Saint-Arnaud
inscribed: Imprinted in red upper left corner the registered logo of the Olympic Games.  In black lower left corner, Copyright 1972, COJO 76. Litho Canada
provenance: Formerly in the collection of Dan Friedman
description: Against a metalic silver background with a long vertical rainbow stribe at center, are presented linear renditions of plan and section views of the main Tower and Exhibition Hall of the Montréal Olympic Park Project.
